# Project Overview

This project analyzes global health outcomes using the [Google Cloud COVID-19 Open Data](https://storage.googleapis.com/covid19-open-data/v3/health.csv) 
and enriches it with macroeconomic indicators from the World Bank API (e.g., GDP per capita).

We document:

- **Data retrieval:** automated download of health data and World Bank indicators  
- **Data enrichment & cleaning:** constructing tidy `health` and `economic_data` tables, then merging into a combined `df_clean`  
- **Visualization:** interactive charts and tables exploring relationships between health outcomes and economic variables
